title: Get started
text: plink_prs() function can used calculate PRS using plink2, given dataframe containing variant ids, effect alleles, corresponding weights, directory containing individual-level genotypes target population. example using plink_prs() function calculate prs, given weights weights_df genotype information contained /project/PMBB/PMBB-Release-2020-2.0/Imputed/pgen/ directory. variant ids weights_df file correspond variant ids plink files specified pfile_dir. may require use crosswalk rsids chrom:pos:ref:alt, depending variant naming conventions base/target datasets.
code: #' \dontrun{ # load weights file into dataframe weights_df <- fs::path_package("extdata", "PGS000667-PMBB.txt", package = "prsr") %>%   vroom::vroom()  # calculate prs prs_res <- plink_prs(   base_df = weights_df,   id_col = variant,   effect_allele_col = effect_allele,   effect_size_col = effect_weight_mg_dl,   pfile_dir = "/project/PMBB/PMBB-Release-2020-2.0/Imputed/pgen/",   plink_bin = "/scratch/Applications/PLINK/plink2_linux_x86_64_20211125/plink2a" ) #' }

title: Calculate PRS using plink2 — plink_prs
text: base_df (dataframe) dataframe containing minimum variant ids, effect alleles, corresponding effect sizes id_col (character) Name column containing variant ids, corresponding variant ids plink files effect_allele_col (character) Name column containing effect alleles effect_size_col (character) Name column containing effect estimates multithread (logical) multi-threading used compute PRS across pfiles parallel (default = TRUE) pfile_dir (character) Directory containing plink files target dataset. directory contains multiple files (example, one per chromosome), PRS can calculated parallel. plink_bin (character) Path executable plink2 binary
